Translations.Text: bol incumbent upon mna ja nie say GOD except truth! Ja pojdem ona znamenie z tvoj Lord let Dieta Izrael ist
He said ona have znamenie potom produce it ona bol truthful
He threw nadol jeho staff it turned into tremendous serpent
He pocas jeho hand it bol biely do beholders
leaders Pharaoh's ludia said This bol ziaden inak than inteligentny kuzelnik
He chudoba berie ona tvoj zem; co robi ty odporucat
They said Respite him jeho brat send summoners kazdy mesto
Let them zvolat kazdy zazitok kuzelnik
Kuzelnik pojdem Pharaoh said my zaplatit my Robit bol winners
He said Ano indeed; ona vecer become mna
They said O Moses either ona throw my throwing
He said Ona throw When they threw they lest ludia oci zastrasit them produced velka kuzlo
My potom inspirovat Moses Throw nadol tvoj staff whereupon it lastovicka whatever they fabricated
Thus truth prevailed co they robi nullified
They defeated potom there they humiliated
